channel.title: A bit to old
channel.description: Okay i know I'm probably a bit to old for Dragon Fable or Mech quest, but I am really into those games now. I am like addicted to them. I am 16 years old, does any one else play those games and are as old as I am? lol

item.title: A bit to old
item.dc:creator: @Logitek Logitek
item.description:
@Logitek wrote:

i used cheat engine to hack dragon fable for leet level.

like a year ago i bought x gaurdian on aq which basically gives u like 30k gold, a crap load of z tokens and stuff but that ruined game for me cus there was nothing more to do so i quit. my bro occasionly plays aq worlds tho.

Read full topic

item.title: A bit to old
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

I haven’t played any of those since I was in my mid-13s. Me and my brother would fight dragons on AQWorlds and I would be blasting Tom Petty all day. Then I stopped…
Hey it’s been a while so I wouldn’t know, but what’s the difference between Dragon Fable and Adventure Quest?

Read full topic
